bio: Amidst the towering trees of Valenwood, I, Miria, emerged from an upbringing that echoed with the harmonious rhythms of the Bosmer way of life. My childhood, filled with the rustling leaves and the gentle whispers of the forest, was marked by the unique challenges of living amidst the sprawling woodlands. Raised within the Bosmer community, I navigated the intricacies of the Green Pact, forging a connection with the natural world that shaped every aspect of my character. The constant dance between the shadows and sunlight within Valenwood became the backdrop to my journey, and as a Bosmer, my life is an intricate tapestry woven into the rich fabric of the ancient forest.
name: Miria
